name: MagnaChip Semiconductor
overview: MagnaChip Semiconductor Corporation designs and manufactures analog and mixed-signal semiconductor products for high volume consumer applications, such as mobile phones, digital televisions, flat panel displays, notebook computers, mobile multimedia devices, and digital cameras. Its products and services allow for the high resolution display of images and video, the conversion of analog signals, such as light and sound, into digital data, and the ability to manage power consumption. The company offers display solutions, imaging solutions, power solutions, and foundry/manufacturing services. The display solutions include panel display drivers for the product range of small to large panel displays, including mobile phones, digital cameras, photo printers, games, monitors, and LCD TVs. The imaging solutions consist of image sensors for camera-equipped applications, such as mobile handsets, PCs, digital cameras, notebook computers, and security cameras. The power solutions include power management products, such as MOSFETs and DC-DC converters, as well as linear regulators, such as LDOs and analog switches for applications, such as mobile phones and LCD televisions. MagnaChip Semiconductor also offers manufacturing services to providers of analog and mixed-signal semiconductors, and produces wafers based on their designs. Its services include specialty analog and mixed-signal process technologies, such as high voltage complementary metal oxide semiconductor (CMOS), embedded memory, and power. The company sells its products to consumer electronics original equipment manufacturers, subsystem designers, and contract manufacturers through a direct sales force, as well as a network of authorized agents and distributors. MagnaChip Semiconductor offers its products in South Korea, Asia Pacific, Japan, North America, and Europe. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Chungbuk, South Korea.

acquisitions.source_description: MagnaChip to Acquire Dawin Electronics, Designer and Manufacturer of Power Modules
